name: Dark Theme Solution - Global Stylesheet
description: This is a global style that attempts to correct eye fatigue when browsing online. It is mostly a combination of existing code, plus some compatibility tricks for certain sites I frequent. This is designed to be used as a part of a complete dark theme solution I have detailed here.
additional_info:
This style sheet is a modified version of the following themes:
 - https://userstyles.org/styles/23516/midnight-surfing-global-dark-style
 - https://userstyles.org/styles/31267/global-dark-style-changes-everything-to-dark
